name: Joseph Lubin
shortBio: Co-founder of Ethereum, Founder and CEO of ConsenSys
fullBio: Co-founder of Ethereum (2014), Founder and CEO of ConsenSys. Princeton graduate in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science. Former VP Technology at Goldman Sachs. Creator of MetaMask and Infura. Discovered Bitcoin in 2011, contacted Vitalik Buterin in January 2014.

name: Andrew Keys
shortBio: Co-founder and Managing Partner of DARMA Capital
fullBio: Co-founder and Managing Partner of DARMA Capital. Former Head of Global Business Development at ConsenSys. Co-creator of the Enterprise Ethereum Alliance. Introduced companies like JPMorgan and Microsoft to Ethereum.

name: Jonathan Christodoro
shortBio: Investor, PayPal Board Member
fullBio: Investor, PayPal Board Member since 2015. Founder of Patriot Global Management. Vice Chairman of The Ether Machine. Former Icahn Capital where he managed multi-billion dollar investments.

name: Taylor Monahan
shortBio: Founder of MyCrypto, Principal Security Researcher at MetaMask
fullBio: Founder of MyCrypto, Principal Security Researcher at MetaMask. Co-founder of MyEtherWallet. Blockchain security expert, known for educational Twitter threads on crypto security.

name: Edward Moncada
shortBio: Co-founder of Blockfolio and Protofund
fullBio: Co-founder of Blockfolio (acquired by FTX for $150M) and Protofund. Former professional poker player, 2005 WSOP bracelet winner. Created one of the most downloaded crypto apps in the world.

name: Cecily Mak
shortBio: COO of Blockdaemon
fullBio: COO of Blockdaemon. Former ConsenSys incubator lead. Former Chief Business and Legal Officer at Flipboard. Digital Media Law professor. Columbia Law School, Georgetown University.

name: Ric Burton
shortBio: Co-founder of Balance.io, Ethereum Designer (2014)
fullBio: Co-founder of Balance.io, Ethereum Designer (2014). Collaborated with Gavin Wood on early dapp browser designs. Balance hosted Hayden Adams during Uniswap V1 development.

name: Rouven Heck
shortBio: Co-founder of uPort, Executive Director of DIF
fullBio: Co-founder of uPort, Executive Director of the Decentralized Identity Foundation (DIF). Identity Lead at ConsenSys Mesh. Champion of open standards for decentralized identity.

name: John Paller
shortBio: Founder of ETHDenver, Executive Steward of Opolis
fullBio: Founder of ETHDenver (world's largest Web3/Ethereum festival) and Executive Steward of Opolis. Based in Denver, Colorado. Transformed ETHDenver into a major ecosystem event.

name: Mark Beylin
shortBio: Co-founder of Bounties Network, Investor at Haun Ventures
fullBio: Co-founder of Bounties Network (one of the first Ethereum protocols to exceed $1M TVL). Currently Investor at Haun Ventures. Carnegie Mellon University graduate.

name: Ash Egan
shortBio: Founder and General Partner of Archetype
fullBio: Founder and General Partner of Archetype. Notable investments: Chainalysis, Mina, Near, Balancer, Privy (acquired by Stripe). World Economic Forum Global Shaper. Stanford Graduate School of Business.

name: Harrison Hines
shortBio: Founder and CEO of Fleek
fullBio: Founder and CEO of Fleek. Agentic cloud platform for AI agents and virtual influencers. Focus on trustless and permissionless open web. Pivoted Terminal.co to Fleek.

name: Ron Patiro
shortBio: Ethereum OG, Investor
fullBio: Ethereum OG, Investor. Invested in Aligned (Web3 infrastructure). Discreet profile in the Ethereum ecosystem.

name: Gonçalo Sá
shortBio: Co-founder of ConsenSys Diligence, Technical Partner at Ethereal Ventures
fullBio: Co-founder of ConsenSys Diligence (hundreds of audits, $25B in potential breaches secured). Technical Partner at Ethereal Ventures. Founder of Creed. Smart contract security expert.

name: Tyler Mulvihill
shortBio: Global Co-Head NFTs at ConsenSys, Co-founder of Treum
fullBio: Global Co-Head NFTs at ConsenSys, Co-founder of Treum and EulerBeats ($3M sales, called 'most genius idea ever' by Mark Cuban). NFT and blockchain traceability expert.

name: Connor Keenan
shortBio: EulerBeats smart contract developer
fullBio: EulerBeats smart contract developer (Treum team). Designer of the EulerBeats bonding curve mechanism. Expert in tokenomics and on-chain economic mechanisms.

name: Russell Verbeeten
shortBio: Ethereum Pioneer (February 2014), Investor
fullBio: Ethereum Pioneer (February 2014). ConsenSys (2015-2020): Global Operations, Product Management, Enterprise Sales. Active investor in the crypto ecosystem.

name: Scott Moore
shortBio: Co-founder of Gitcoin
fullBio: Co-founder of Gitcoin. Helped distribute $50M+ to public goods projects via quadratic funding. Core steward: ENS, Gnosis Safe, Optimism. Public goods funding champion.

name: Jesse Grushack
shortBio: Co-founder of Ujo Music and Six Agency
fullBio: Co-founder of Ujo Music and Six Agency. Co-creator of Ethereal Summit. Six Agency: helped Eminem buy a BAYC, brokered Wu-Tang Clan album sale to PleasrDAO.

name: Georgio Constantinou
shortBio: Co-founder of Six Agency, Artist Manager
fullBio: Co-founder of Six Agency. Artist manager, NFT specialist. Brokered Wu-Tang Clan album sale ($4M to PleasrDAO). 'Once freed a wu-tang album from the feds'.

name: Vijay Michalik
shortBio: Head of Product at Superfluid Finance
fullBio: Head of Product at Superfluid Finance. 4 years at ConsenSys. Active in Ethereum community since 2015. Passionate about real-time DeFi and money streams.

name: Brianna Montgomery
shortBio: Co-founder of Fei Protocol, former VP of Growth at EigenLayer
fullBio: Co-founder of Fei Protocol ($19M raised in 2021), former VP of Growth at EigenLayer. Former Business Development Lead at ConsenSys Diligence. Currently COO of a Stealth Startup.

name: Eric Arsenault
shortBio: CEO of Venture Club, Partner at MetaCartel Ventures
fullBio: CEO of Venture Club, Partner at MetaCartel Ventures. Former Product Research & Growth Lead at DAOstack. Grew DAOs assets from ~0 to $80M during tenure. DAO governance expert.

name: Bryan Peters
shortBio: Co-founder of Sobol
fullBio: Co-founder of Sobol (app to visualize and manage DAOs accountability structures). Bankless DAO Season 0. Inspired by Holacracy and Teal organizations.

name: Aaron McDonald
shortBio: Co-founder and CEO of Futureverse, creator of FLUF World
fullBio: Co-founder and CEO of Futureverse, creator of FLUF World. First Māori-founded Unicorn ($1B+). Ernst & Young Tech Entrepreneur of the Year 2019. Metaverse pioneer.

name: Tyler Ward
shortBio: Co-founder of BarnBridge and Universe.XYZ
fullBio: Co-founder of BarnBridge ($180M+ TVL) and Universe.XYZ. Also co-founder: Proof Systems, FIAT DAO, EnterDAO, D64. Former ConsenSys. Serial DeFi entrepreneur.

name: Keegan Selby
shortBio: Co-founder of Fourth Revolution Capital (4RC)
fullBio: Co-founder of Fourth Revolution Capital (4RC). Engineer, USC graduate. Focus: DeFi, NFTs, Gaming, Media, Metaverse, DAO Tooling. Active crypto investor.

name: EJ Rogers
shortBio: Co-founder of Fourth Revolution Capital (4RC)
fullBio: Co-founder of Fourth Revolution Capital (4RC) with Keegan Selby. Based in Santa Monica. Focus on long-term product-market fit and sustainable utility.

name: Ben Lakoff
shortBio: Co-founder of Charged Particles, General Partner at Bankless Ventures
fullBio: Co-founder of Charged Particles. General Partner at Bankless Ventures, launched with David Hoffman and Ryan Sean Adams. CFA, University of Chicago Booth graduate. Host of Alternative Asset Allocation podcast.

name: Marc Weinstein
shortBio: Partner and Head of Platform at Mechanism Capital
fullBio: Partner and Head of Platform at Mechanism Capital. Wharton, former Morgan Stanley. Founder of 90sFest. Appears in Netflix Fyre Festival documentary as 'voice of reason'.

name: Nathan Doctor
shortBio: Founder of Infinite Capital, Co-founder of Codewars
fullBio: Founder of Infinite Capital, Co-founder of Codewars (2M+ engineers) and Qualified.io (acquired by Andela). USC Marshall. Accomplished photographer and designer.

name: Matt Kaye
shortBio: COO and Managing Partner of Blockhead Capital
fullBio: COO and Managing Partner of Blockhead Capital (crypto hedge fund founded in 2017). Specialized in staking on Proof-of-Stake blockchains. Based in Los Angeles.

name: Matt Slater
shortBio: Founder and GP of Stateless Ventures
fullBio: Founder and GP of Stateless Ventures. First Bitcoin investment in 2013, Ethereum crowd sale 2014. Investments: Ethereum, 0x, Synthetix, Cosmos, MakerDAO.

name: Sam Feinberg
shortBio: Managing Partner of Cypher Capital
fullBio: Managing Partner of Cypher Capital. Former Morgan Stanley, then professional poker player. Worked at Blockfolio. Philanthropist via Joseph and Bessie Feinberg Foundation.

name: Andy Beal
shortBio: Ecosystem Lead at Forta Network
fullBio: Ecosystem Lead at Forta Network (protects $36B+, $23M raised by a16z). 5 years at Ernst & Young Blockchain. Former lawyer. Clients: Coinbase, Gemini, Kraken.

name: Joshua Lapidus
shortBio: Executive Community Steward at Opolis, Co-founder of SporkDAO
fullBio: Executive Community Steward at Opolis, Co-founder of SporkDAO (ETHDenver's DAO). Nicknamed 'HR of the DAOs'. ConsenSys and Lyft alumnus (until IPO).

name: end0xiii
shortBio: Community and Product at Tokemak
fullBio: Community and Product at Tokemak (DeFi liquidity primitive, $1B TVL in 2021). Key spokesperson. Developed 'Tokemechs' branding. Pseudonymous profile.

name: Alec Gutman
shortBio: Founder of Peeple Work/DAO, Head of Talent at ConsenSys Mesh
fullBio: Founder of Peeple Work/DAO (first recruiting DAO), Head of Talent at ConsenSys Mesh. $120K+ in Optimism grants. OP Badgeholder. Self-described 'Steward of Ethereum'.

name: Sharad Malhautra
shortBio: Co-founder and CEO of dSilo
fullBio: Co-founder and CEO of dSilo (Generative AI for procurement). 18+ years experience, former EY. Recognized by Spend Matters' Future 5 List. Supply chain and AI expert.

name: Jay Gutta
shortBio: Co-founder and CTO of dSilo
fullBio: Co-founder and CTO of dSilo. Deep-learning AI engine developer. Former Ernst & Young (~14 years). Based in Atlanta. Artificial intelligence and machine learning expert.

name: Rohan Handa
shortBio: Head of Strategic Investments & Partnerships at Mysten Labs
fullBio: Head of Strategic Investments & Partnerships at Mysten Labs (Sui). Helped launch ApeCoin ($8B FDV) and Otherside NFTs ($235M revenue) for Yuga Labs. Tokenomics expert.

name: Odysseas Lamtzidis
shortBio: Founder and CEO of Phylax Systems
fullBio: Founder and CEO of Phylax Systems ($4.5M seed, led by Nascent). Former Protocol Engineer at Nomad (lived through $190M hack in real-time). Mission: 'solve security so crypto can win'.
